entity.name: activity
entity.query: SELECT iati_synchroniser_datasetnote.id AS id, iati_synchroniser_datasetnote.iati_identifier AS iati_identifier, exception_type, model, field, message, line_number, variable, iati_synchroniser_publisher.publisher_iati_id AS publisher_iati_id, iati_synchroniser_publisher.name AS publisher_name, iati_synchroniser_publisher.display_name AS publisher_display_name FROM iati_synchroniser_datasetnote, iati_synchroniser_dataset, iati_synchroniser_publisher WHERE iati_synchroniser_datasetnote.dataset_id = iati_synchroniser_dataset.id AND iati_synchroniser_dataset.publisher_id = iati_synchroniser_publisher.id
